definition: ten-pin bowling/bowling ball/(baseball etc) ground ball
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!

sentences.english: You are not pitching right, Charlie Brown. How they are hitting the ball on the ground…
sentences.chinese: 你投的不正確，查理布朗，他們打出地滾球。

sentences.english: Hongkong Electric Lawn Bowls team players.
Former President of Penang Amatuer Swimming Association and Penang Lawn Bowl Association.
sentences.chinese: 曾擔任檳州業餘游泳公會和檳州草地滾球協會主席。
